thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: abdelmajid lachkar
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 abdelmajid lachkar

author: abdelmajid lachkar
title: abdelmajid lachkar
text:
The goods are in very good quality, and also packing and delivery are very good.
And the most important thing is that you always have someone who takes care of you.
I recently had to contact the Customer Service staff about an out of stock item. CS quickly organized a reimbursement that I greatly appreciate
